name: Chill Shooter
description:
Chill Shooter - beat your highscore and buy upgrades! This game is to chill out, it's not hard.  Remember, don't go into the dark and don't touch big meteorites, also don't go near them! You might die! Small meteorites can go through big meteorites.

CONTROLS:

WSAD: MOVE

AIMING: MOUSE

SHOOTING: GAME SHOOTS AUTOMATICALLY

*You can support me if you want. If not, just choose: No thanks, just take me to downloads*

*NOTICE: Windows build works for 100%. Mac and Linux should work*
